channel.title: Project Anfernio
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O7R_Rt4zts
Project Anfernio is a semi-eco server biased, for the most part, around playerkilling. Anfernio, coming from RuneScape & being a pker knows what is correct and what is wrong. Currently the only thing that needs to be finished before the releasing is a defence system. After the releasing, I'm going to be working on skills so players don't get bored.
basically you do barrows for barrows armor, you pk and get PKP and buy shit from PKP shop.
Etc etc pics l8r
Coming soon

item.title: Project Anfernio
item.dc:creator: @Jerico_Pimpinbro Jerico Pimpinbro
item.description:
@Jerico_Pimpinbro wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:412384”]I’ve edited the video out (and cleaned the thread), as all it contains is a random PK thing (that doesn’t show any features…?) and a website link.

I suggest you come up with a few more features in the next 24 hours, or I’ll lock this ‘development’

But Kono-Chan, stop it please. Any more of whatever that was and I’ll just infract you…[/quote]

Thanks for saving my day Davidi2! I was having a rather hard time flaming him back & although I am on your hated list you helped a pal out!

Read full topic
